name: Room of Roots
longDesc: This room hangs thick with moisture. Clearly you're deep underground, as the roots of the many trees descend from the greenhouse and jungle above and hang from the ceiling.
shortDesc: A room with walls made of thick, entwined roots.

shelves.name: Hedera Hibernica
shelves.desc: A lush, green ivy with small white flowers.

shelves.name: Climbing Hydrangea
shelves.desc: A more floral-like vine with bunches of tiny flowers.

doors.name: Steep Cliff
doors.desc: A steep cliff lies to the west- the ladder you used to descend still hangs here to enable your egress.

doors.name: Slick Stones
doors.desc: A path of water-slicked stones leads off to the east, towards the sound of a waterfall.
